2XM.flavor: "Artifice sundered the world. It shall not again wreak such sorrow."
2XM.name: Arcum Dagsson
2XM.text: {T}: Target artifact creature's controller sacrifices it. That player may search their library for a noncreature artifact card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle their library.

2XM.name: Atraxa, Praetors' Voice
2XM.text:
Flying, vigilance, deathtouch, lifelink
At the beginning of your end step, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

2XM.name: Atraxa, Praetors' Voice
2XM.text:
Flying, vigilance, deathtouch, lifelink
At the beginning of your end step, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

2XM.name: Austere Command
2XM.text:
Choose two —
• Destroy all artifacts.
• Destroy all enchantments.
• Destroy all creatures with converted mana cost 3 or less.
• Destroy all creatures with converted mana cost 4 or greater.

2XM.flavor: Its beak rends flesh and bone, exposing the tender marrow of dream.
2XM.name: Baleful Strix
2XM.text:
Flying, deathtouch
When Baleful Strix enters the battlefield, draw a card.

2XM.flavor: "Flesh is a betrayal of the self."
2XM.name: Blade Splicer
2XM.text:
When Blade Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
Golem creatures you control have first strike.

2XM.name: Blightsteel Colossus
2XM.text:
Trample, infect, indestructible
If Blightsteel Colossus would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Blightsteel Colossus and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

2XM.name: Blightsteel Colossus
2XM.text:
Trample, infect, indestructible
If Blightsteel Colossus would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Blightsteel Colossus and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

2XM.name: Blinkmoth Nexus
2XM.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}: Blinkmoth Nexus becomes a 1/1 Blinkmoth artifact creature with flying until end of turn. It's still a land.
{1}, {T}: Target Blinkmoth creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

2XM.flavor: Twice brewed and twice blessed, the remedy restores both body and mind.
2XM.name: Boon Reflection
2XM.text: If you would gain life, you gain twice that much life instead.

2XM.flavor: As Glissa searches for the truth about Memnarch, Bosh searches to unearth the secrets of his past.
2XM.name: Bosh, Iron Golem
2XM.text:
Trample
{3}{R}, Sacrifice an artifact: Bosh, Iron Golem deals damage equal to the sacrificed artifact's converted mana cost to any target.

2XM.name: Breya, Etherium Shaper
2XM.text:
When Breya, Etherium Shaper enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 blue Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.
{2}, Sacrifice two artifacts: Choose one —
• Breya deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.
• Target creature gets -4/-4 until end of turn.
• You gain 5 life.

2XM.name: Champion of Lambholt
2XM.text:
Creatures with power less than Champion of Lambholt's power can't block creatures you control.
Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Champion of Lambholt.

2XM.flavor:
"Tomorrow wears yesterday's face."
—Kordel the Cryptic
2XM.name: Conjurer's Closet
2XM.text: At the beginning of your end step, you may exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.

2XM.flavor: Each night that his bowl fills, a village mourns.
2XM.name: Cragganwick Cremator
2XM.text: When Cragganwick Cremator enters the battlefield, discard a card at random. If you discard a creature card this way, Cragganwick Cremator deals damage equal to that card's power to target player or planeswalker.

2XM.flavor: "Oh, *that's* what that switch does!"
2XM.name: Cyclonic Rift
2XM.text:
Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.
Overload {6}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

2XM.flavor: The Izzet specialize in unnatural disaster.
2XM.name: Cyclonic Rift
2XM.text:
Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.
Overload {6}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

2XM.name: Dark Confidant
2XM.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.

2XM.flavor: Greatness, at any cost.
2XM.name: Dark Confidant
2XM.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its converted mana cost.

2XM.name: Dark Depths
2XM.text:
Dark Depths enters the battlefield with ten ice counters on it.
{3}: Remove an ice counter from Dark Depths.
When Dark Depths has no ice counters on it, sacrifice it. If you do, create Marit Lage, a legendary 20/20 black Avatar creature token with flying and indestructible.

2XM.flavor: Many necromancers share the same last words—the ones that conclude the undeath ritual.
2XM.name: Doomed Necromancer
2XM.text: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice Doomed Necromancer: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

2XM.name: Doubling Season
2XM.text:
If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.
If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

2XM.name: Doubling Season
2XM.text:
If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.
If an effect would put one or more counters on a permanent you control, it puts twice that many of those counters on that permanent instead.

2XM.name: Engineered Explosives
2XM.text:
Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)
{2}, Sacrifice Engineered Explosives: Destroy each nonland permanent with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Engineered Explosives.

2XM.flavor:
"I use maps to find out where explorers have already been. Then I go the other way."
—Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter
2XM.name: Expedition Map
2XM.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Expedition Map: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

2XM.flavor:
"Let's see. I've been here, here, here, here, and here. Where next?"
—Olenn, tireless traveler
2XM.name: Expedition Map
2XM.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Expedition Map: Search your library for a land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

2XM.flavor:
"Only when we journey into the unknown can we find the impossible."
—Cyrul the Wanderer
2XM.name: Exploration
2XM.text: You may play an additional land on each of your turns.

2XM.flavor: With every step she took, a new world unfolded before her.
2XM.name: Exploration
2XM.text: You may play an additional land on each of your turns.

2XM.flavor: Its wings disturb more than air.
2XM.name: Flickerwisp
2XM.text:
Flying
When Flickerwisp enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

2XM.flavor: An empty canvas holds infinite possibilities.
2XM.name: Glimmervoid
2XM.text:
At the beginning of the end step, if you control no artifacts, sacrifice Glimmervoid.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

2XM.flavor: "Fools dig for water, corpses, or gold. The earth's real treasure is far deeper."
2XM.name: Grim Lavamancer
2XM.text: {R}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Grim Lavamancer deals 2 damage to any target.

2XM.flavor:
"Better to flare out than to gutter."
—Flamekin expression
2XM.name: Heat Shimmer
2XM.text: Create a token that's a copy of target creature, except it has haste and "At the beginning of the end step, exile this permanent."

2XM.name: Jace, the Mind Sculptor
2XM.text:
+2: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library.
0: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
−1: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
−12: Exile all cards from target player's library, then that player shuffles their hand into their library.

2XM.name: Jace, the Mind Sculptor
2XM.text:
+2: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library.
0: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
−1: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

2XM.flavor: "I'll have my revenge if I have to call on every force from above and below."
2XM.name: Kaalia of the Vast
2XM.text:
Flying
Whenever Kaalia of the Vast attacks an opponent, you may put an Angel, Demon, or Dragon creature card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking that opponent.

2XM.flavor: "I'll have my revenge if I have to call on every force from above and below."
2XM.name: Kaalia of the Vast
2XM.text:
Flying
Whenever Kaalia of the Vast attacks an opponent, you may put an Angel, Demon, or Dragon creature card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking that opponent.

+4: Target player exiles a card from their hand.
−3: Exile target permanent.
−14: Restart the game, leaving in exile all non-Aura permanent cards exiled with Karn Liberated. Then put those cards onto the battlefield under your control.

2XM.name: Karn Liberated
2XM.text:
+4: Target player exiles a card from their hand.
−3: Exile target permanent.
−14: Restart the game, leaving in exile all non-Aura permanent cards exiled with Karn Liberated. Then put those cards onto the battlefield under your control.

2XM.flavor: There are few problems that can't be solved by putting a hole in the world.
2XM.name: Lux Cannon
2XM.text:
{T}: Put a charge counter on Lux Cannon.
{T}, Remove three charge counters from Lux Cannon: Destroy target permanent.

2XM.flavor: He climbs a staircase of falling souls, fighting the continuous pull of the void.
2XM.name: Magus of the Abyss
2XM.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, destroy target nonartifact creature that player controls of their choice. It can't be regenerated.

2XM.name: Mana Crypt
2XM.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you.
{T}: Add {C}{C}.

2XM.flavor: At first they thought the vault was empty. Then the walls began to glow.
2XM.name: Mana Crypt
2XM.text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Mana Crypt deals 3 damage to you.
{T}: Add {C}{C}.

2XM.flavor: She protects the sacred groves from blight, drought, and the Unbeholden.
2XM.name: Noble Hierarch
2XM.text:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}.

2XM.flavor: In all her years of vigil, her resolve has never faltered.
2XM.name: Noble Hierarch
2XM.text:
Exalted (Whenever a creature you control attacks alone, that creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)
{T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}.

2XM.name: Path to Exile
2XM.text: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle their library.

2XM.flavor: "What was once formed by masons, shaped by smiths, or given life by mages, I will return to the embrace of the earth."
2XM.name: Reclamation Sage
2XM.text: When Reclamation Sage enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.

2XM.flavor: Whole again in honor and horn.
2XM.name: Rhys the Redeemed
2XM.text:
{2}{G/W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 green and white Elf Warrior creature token.
{4}{G/W}{G/W}, {T}: For each creature token you control, create a token that's a copy of that creature.

2XM.flavor: An artificer once dropped one in a vault full of coins. She has yet to find it.
2XM.name: Sculpting Steel
2XM.text: You may have Sculpting Steel enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact on the battlefield.

2XM.flavor: To gain audience with the hegemon, one must bring a riddle she has not heard.
2XM.name: Sharuum the Hegemon
2XM.text:
Flying
When Sharuum the Hegemon enters the battlefield, you may return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

2XM.text:
Flying
Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.)
{B}: Skithiryx, the Blight Dragon gains haste until end of turn.
{B}{B}: Regenerate Skithiryx.

2XM.name: Sneak Attack
2XM.text: {R}: You may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Sacrifice the creature at the beginning of the next end step.

Flying
When Sphinx Summoner enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact creature card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.

2XM.flavor: "No matter how strong, an unarmed fighter is no more than a fool."
2XM.name: Stonehewer Giant

Vigilance

2XM.flavor: Amid rumors of war, the third act of *The Absolution of the Guildpact* was quickly rewritten as a tragedy.
2XM.name: Thespian's Stage
2XM.text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}: Thespian's Stage becomes a copy of target land, except it has this ability.

2XM.flavor: Lymph, the fluid essence of blinkmoths, is prized by wizards for the rush of intellect it provides.
2XM.name: Thirst for Knowledge
2XM.text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.

2XM.flavor: Only when two oracles speak in unison is an omen accepted as truth.
2XM.name: Thought Reflection
2XM.text: If you would draw a card, draw two cards instead.

2XM.flavor: Goblins generally have two possessions: one per hand.
2XM.name: Trash for Treasure
2XM.text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact.
Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

2XM.flavor: In his hunger for power and knowledge, Urza dug deep into Dominaria's ancient past.
2XM.name: Urza's Mine
2XM.text: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Power-Plant and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

2XM.flavor: When the blood hunt lost its thrill, she looked for less tangible means of domination.
2XM.name: Vampire Hexmage
2XM.text:
First strike
Sacrifice Vampire Hexmage: Remove all counters from target permanent.

2XM.name: Voice of Resurgence
2XM.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell during your turn or when Voice of Resurgence dies, create a green and white Elemental creature token with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control."

2XM.text:
Deathtouch, lifelink
